you can sense the english vibe .
output.sentences: My Aunt Linda came over to show us some pictures of the tour she took through a church on her vacation.
There was such beautiful artwork that my family began to want to go themselves!
There were signs displaing what had been on the site in the past.
My mom said she had never seen such beautiful reverent artwork.
I felt good vibes and a natural flowing of all of my senses much like I had when I had visited some of the ancient English sites.
